Articles.Content: Ok, I've been playing Ksp for a few months now and I've managed to get some mods. I have Mechjeb, kethane, Novapunch, B9 aerospace, and bobcat's home mod. I've launched a munar kethane satellite(that runs out of power on the dark side), and for some reason 1. I can't control it (when it has power) and 2. I try to manually decouple my probe from the tug stage, and the decoupler menu doesn't even show up!
If you are in time acceleration, you can't control your ship
